__e: I know somebody who is crazy, and I am nothing... like him.
And if she doesn't, she's crazier than I am, and how crazy is that?
Although I don't know what's crazy and what's not anymore.
He's crazy, but he's not insane.
I mean, I know it sounds crazy, but, you know... I don't know.
Well, it's crazy, but it's not, you know?
And I know it sounds crazy, but I know what I saw.
Look, I know it sounds crazy, but you've seen what it can do. You've felt it.
I don't know if I'm crazy, but if you don't give me what I want...
Because if the choice were between the two of us, sweet sister, there's not a man on this earth who would be foolish enough to choose me.
Hey, is this a sane thing to be doing?
Who would be crazy enough to pull off a stunt like that?
Tell me this isn't the craziest thing we've ever done.
Okay, fine, but that... it's crazy for you to go back to that place without me, isn't it?
This is the craziest thing you've ever done.
No. And this is the craziest one of all.
I don't care what you mother says. I want to do that crazy thing that we always talked about.
You're right, you're probably crazier than I've ever been.
Oh... oh, it's been a crazy ride, hasn't it?
But you're not thinking of doing anything crazy, are you?
I know. It's totally crazy, right?
